NewsArticle.Title: Robo Smasher Closed Beta has started!
NewsArticle.Content: Robo Smasher closed-beta has officially started! If you signed up for closed-beta but have not received your character ID and password, please check your spam folder. If you still do not have it send us a ticket under Robo Smasher Support at support.kru.com If you have not signed up you can do so at the following site: Closed Beta Sign-up
